name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: SHIFT 543: BE to Gregorian Year Converter

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: SHIFT 543 Chrome extension converts Buddhist Era years to Gregorian for familiar dates in Google search, ideal for Thailand.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The SHIFT 543 Chrome extension automatically transforms BE dates into their Gregorian equivalents, adjusting for the 543-year difference, directly in your search results on Google. Perfect for users in Thailand or anyone encountering BE dates online, SHIFT 543 ensures you see dates in the familiar Gregorian format you're used to. Toggle the conversion on and off as needed for a seamless browsing experience.
